infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Hairsap needs access to your camera to capture your face for verification and security reasons during delivery of service.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Hairsap needs permission to access your photo library to upload hairstyle image, set custom avatar and upload videos.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Hairsap needs users location for connecting clients to the nearest beauty pro for quicker delivery of services
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Hairsap needs users location for connecting clients to the nearest beauty pro for quicker delivery of services
